male.name: eyewear
male.title: Rectangle Frames
male.desc: Rectangular frames balance oval faces by adding width and contrasting soft curves.

male.name: cap
male.title: Baseball Caps
male.desc: The classic baseball cap complements oval faces because the structured crown and curved brim don't overwhelm or add unwanted length.

male.name: hairstyle
male.title: Medium Length with Volume
male.desc: Pompadours, quiffs, and side parts with volume on top elongate the face slightly and create a stylish look.

male.name: beardstyle
male.title: Short & Defined
male.desc: A neatly trimmed beard, stubble, or goatee keeps things clean-cut while adding definition to your jawline

female.name: eyewear
female.title: Rectangular Frames
female.desc: Rectangular frames balance oval faces by adding width and contrasting soft curves.

female.name: makeup
female.title: Softly Sculpted Oval Face Makeup
female.desc: Oval faces can apply blush along hairline and cheeks for length, or near ears and jawline for width; highlight forehead, under-eye area, and chin for balance; use bronzer on cheeks, temples, and jawline for contour; keep brows neat with a soft arch and angle; and focus on long, thick lashes.

female.name: hairstyle
female.title: Wavy Shoulder Length Hair
female.desc: Long, flowing hair with or without layers is a timeless choice. Consider adding highlights or lowlights for extra depth.

female.name: earrings
female.title: Square, triangle, or other geometric earrings
female.desc: Geometric earrings offer a stylish way to complement the natural beauty of an oval face. They add a touch of modern edge, define your features, and highlight the balanced proportions of your face shape
